name: Be Human .IO
tagline: A differing ideology to how we use technology.
body:
### Our Primary Directive * Be Human: don’t act like a machine to society, acknowledge them as we did pre-telephone. * IO: To perform an input or output operation between human and machine; electronics are always used. BeHuman.IO is a series of projects, experiments and exportation into the unknown, all under one common goal: for the betterment of society. Be them open source, free or paid, all their underlying use is to improve and enhance ourselves. Mind and body. ### Manifesto Guidelines 1. Never act automated when speaking to another human, use first names and reframe from use of automated messages 2. Profit can be made off another but it should bring honest happiness, never sold on F.U.D. 3. All code used should be made open source unless otherwise bought to speed development 4. Updates and development statuses should always be made public 5. Never use paywalls or require email lists to gain profit 6. Ask as little as possible personal information when billing 7. Dumb everything down like /r/explainlikeimfive/ 8. Sharing is caring, be your inner nerd/geek and show how its made/works 9. Some handicaps go beyond the 5 senses, adapt for these individuals 10. When in doubt, ask for help. And always thank for another time
This work is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike 4.0 International License. ### Current Projects * Be More .Clothing: Philadelphia's first independent fashionable wearables boutique. ### Past Projects * Interpersonal Campus Security: An start to end system to watch and protect students as they to and from school. * Philly Pack Walk: A service design to assist dog owner’s have their pet[s] walked when they are unable too because of work or other busy reasons. * In My Shoes: A virtual reality computer simulation platform designed to build empathy on an array of disorders & diseases by experiencing the another's world for a brief moment in time. You'll see the world as they do and internalize how they feel. * Augmented Reality World Reactive System: Hearing, Visual & Mental user adaptive life Assistive device ### Support or Contact Having trouble with viewing this? (https://help.github.com/pages) or contact support at hello@bemore.clothing and we’ll help you sort it out.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
